name: VRealm Funverse – Ultimate VR Game Hub
summary:
VRealm Funverse – Your Expanding VR Universe!

Step inside VRealm Funverse, a world of hand-tracked VR games built for fun, creativity, and physics-based action.
Play across multiple genres — from slicing fruits and shooting waves to boxing, painting, and stacking challenges — all in one evolving hub.

Main Games

Fruit Frenzy – Slice fast, score higher, master the blade.

Bullet Rush – Dodge, shoot, and survive the rush.

Fist Fight – Step into the ring and brawl against AI boxers.

Rhythm Slash – Cut...
